Package Controller

Class CRUDMovies

java.lang.Object
Controller.CRUDMovies
public class CRUDMovies extends Object
A class of CRUD operations on the Movies.dat & Reviews.dat file Calls RWController to read and write data into .dat file
Since:
2022-10-25
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static boolean initialize()
      Method to initialize the .dat files and place all of them in runtime during execution of the java file
      Returns:
      boolean yes to denote all the .dat files are properly read

    • readMovieList

      public static void readMovieList() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      This method calls the RWController, to read the file, and put them into listOfMovie Arraylist. THIS READ FUNCTION HAS TO BE USED EVERYTIME THE PROGRAMME STARTS
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • retrieveMovieList

      public static ArrayList<Movie> retrieveMovieList()
      This method gets the Hashmap previous being created in the readTheatreList() function
      Returns:
      ArrayList

    • retrieveTopFiveMovie

      public static ArrayList<Movie> retrieveTopFiveMovie()
      This method retrieves the top5 movies based on salesnumber
      Returns:
      ArrayList

      This method enables a movie to be removed from the current listOfMovie

      Throws:

      public static void addMovieIntoList(Movie movie) throws IOException
      This method adds an individual Movie class into the listOfMovie calls updateMovieList()
      Parameters:
      movie - the Movie to be inserted
      Throws:
      IOException

      public static void overWriteMovieListNewList(ArrayList<Movie> newList) throws IOException
      This method overwrites the current listOfMovie with a new list of input newList replacing as the new listOfMovie

      newList -
      Throws:

    • readReviewList

      public static void readReviewList() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      This method calls the RWController, to read the file, and put them into listOfMovieReviews Hashmap. THIS READ FUNCTION HAS TO BE USED EVERYTIME THE PROGRAMME STARTS
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • updateReviewList

      public static void updateReviewList() throws IOException
      This method updates/overwrites the Reviews.dat file.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • retrieveReviewList

      public static ArrayList<Review> retrieveReviewList(Movie movie)
      This method gets the Hashmap previous being created in the readReviewList() function
      Parameters:
      movie - to be inputted to get the list of reviews pertaining to the individual movie
      Returns:
      ArrayList

    • addReviewIntoList

      public static void addReviewIntoList(Movie movie, Review review) throws IOException
      This method adds a review class into the listOfMovieReviews Hashmap.
      Parameters:
      movie - the Reviews pertaining to the individual movie
      review - the Review to be appended to the Hashmap
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getAvgMovieRating

      public static double getAvgMovieRating(Movie movie)
      This method enables to movie to calculate average movie rating based on the the review.getRating from each of the Review classes retreived from retrieveReviewList(movie)
      Parameters:
      movie - the Reviews pertaining to the individual movie
      Returns:
      double, the average score of a movie
